Package backend.tradesystem.trader_managers

Class TradingInfoManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.Manager
backend.tradesystem.trader_managers.TradingInfoManager
public class TradingInfoManager
extends Manager
Handles anything about getting info on trading and on traders, but this does not handle trading itself

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Initialize the objects to get items from databases

    Making the database objects with set file paths

    • TradingInfoManager

      public TradingInfoManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database

    • TradingInfoManager

      public TradingInfoManager​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path

      Gets all the trader ids in the database
      Returns:
      all the traders in the database

    • searchTrader

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> searchTrader​(java.lang.String name)
      Return trader ids that contain name
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search for
      Returns:
      traders with similar names

    • getAllTradersInCity

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllTradersInCity​(java.lang.String city)
      Gets all the trader ids within the same city
      Parameters:
      city - the city name
      Returns:
      list of all traders within the same city

    • getTradableItemsWithName

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTradableItemsWithName​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets tradable item ids that has the name substring within the input name string For example, if the item name is "Apple Pie", and the name to check for is "apple", then that TradableItem is included as a list of items to return
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check for
      Returns:
      list of tradable item ids that match the name

    • getTraderThatHasTradableItemId

      public java.lang.String getTraderThatHasTradableItemId​(java.lang.String id) throws TradableItemNotFoundException
      Gets the trader that has the tradable item id
      Parameters:
      id - the tradable item id
      Returns:
      the trader id
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - if the item id is invalid

    • getFrequentTraders

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFrequentTraders​(java.lang.String traderId) throws AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, TradeNotFoundException
      Return the 3 most frequent traders that this trader has traded with.
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader being checked for
      Returns:
      a Trader array list of the 3 most frequently traded with Traders
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - trader is not allowed to know the frequent traders
      UserNotFoundException - user not found
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found

    • getRecentTradeItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRecentTradeItems​(java.lang.String traderId) throws AuthorizationException, TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Gets a list of the items used in trades
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      Returns:
      list of tradable items ids that were recently traded
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - trader not allowed to get recently traded items
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found
      UserNotFoundException - trader id is bad

    • suggestLend

      public java.lang.String[] suggestLend​(java.lang.String thisTraderId, boolean inCity) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Returns one of the best lends that trader thisTraderId can preform The elements in the list is in the format of [thisTraderId, toTraderId, itemId]
      Parameters:
      thisTraderId - The id of the trader that will be lending the item
      inCity - Whether to only search for possible trades within the trader's city
      Returns:
      one of the best lends that trader thisTraderId can preform
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user can not be found
      AuthorizationException - if the user is frozen

    • suggestTrade

      public java.lang.String[] suggestTrade​(java.lang.String thisTraderId, boolean inCity) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Returns one of the best trades this trader can perform The elements in the list is in the format of [thisTraderId, toTraderId, itemIdToGive, itemIdToReceive]
      Parameters:
      thisTraderId - is the id of this trader
      inCity - Whether or not to suggest trades only within the trader's city.
      Returns:
      a single possible suggested trade (a trade where each trader gives an item from the other trader's wishlist)
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - bad trader ids
      AuthorizationException - can't suggest because user is not a trader or is frozen

    • automatedTradeSuggestion

      public java.lang.String[] automatedTradeSuggestion​(java.lang.String thisTraderId, boolean filterCity) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Gives the best trade by taking the trader's wishlist items and their names. Returns string array in this format [thisTraderId, mostSimTraderId, mostSimGiveItemId, mostSimGetItemId]
      Parameters:
      thisTraderId - id of this trader
      filterCity - is if the trader wants to filter for city
      Returns:
      an array with this traders id, the other traders id, the item this trader will give, the item this trader will get
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if thisTraderId is a bad id
      AuthorizationException - if thisTraderId isn't a trader
